content: Tried sharing your ideas, but you're still not included in decision making as much as you'd like – and end up feeling frustrated as people don’t seem to get the value you can bring
Spent hours on books and courses to advance faster – but you are overwhelmed and all over the place, not progressing in a specific direction
Applied for better roles but keep getting bypassed, most likely because you didn’t fully succeed in communicating the actual value you can create
